devDependencies.browserify: compiles Node.js style (with requare()) JavaScript into a output file
Browserify lets you organize your JavaScript into multiple files in Node.js style
devDependencies.gulp-browserify: plug-in for Gulp that runs Browserify
devDependencies.karma: tool for launching browsers to test client-side JavaScript
With Karma, you'd be able to write tests in Mocha and run them in any browser
devDependencies.karma-chai: plugin that includes the Chai assertion framework (assert() functon)
devDependencies.karma-chrome-launcher: enables Karma to launch Google Chrome browsers locally.
devDependencies.karma-mocha: plugin that enables Karma to run Mocha tests
